forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady light rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 59F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 59F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.
